scripts.prebuild: rm -rf standalone-build && mkdir -p standalone-build && cp -RL ../web/.next/standalone/* standalone-build/ && mkdir -p standalone-build/apps/web/.next && cp -RL ../web/public standalone-build/apps/web/ && cp -RL ../web/.next/static standalone-build/apps/web/.next/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: pnpm prebuild && electron-builder build && pnpm postbuild
scripts.build:mac: pnpm prebuild && electron-builder build --mac && pnpm postbuild
scripts.build:win: pnpm prebuild && electron-builder build --win && pnpm postbuild
scripts.build:linux: pnpm prebuild && electron-builder build --linux && pnpm postbuild
